headline: L3Harris (LHX) Q3 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for L3Harris (LHX) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: L3Harris (LHX) Surpasses Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: L3Harris (LHX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.47% and +2.27%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: L3Harris (LHX) Surpasses Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: L3Harris Technologies beats Q3 estimates, raises 2025 guidance
summary: Investing.com -- L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) reported third-quarter results that exceeded analyst expectations, with strong organic revenue growth and improved margins driving a guidance increase for the full year. The company’s stock rose 0.7% premarket following the announcement.

raw.headline: L3Harris Technologies beats Q3 estimates, raises 2025 guidance
raw.summary: Investing.com -- L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) reported third-quarter results that exceeded analyst expectations, with strong organic revenue growth and improved margins driving a guidance increase for the full year. The company’s stock rose 0.7% premarket following the announcement.

headline: L3Harris: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Melbourne, Florida-based company said it had net income of $2.46. Earnings, adjusted for asset impairment costs and pretax expenses, were $2.70 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: L3Harris: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Melbourne, Florida-based company said it had net income of $2.46. Earnings, adjusted for asset impairment costs and pretax expenses, were $2.70 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.
